Articles.Content: I mean the ground bases, because its really hard connecting your bases with docking ports without a week or too..., KSP should add a KAS like system.

I found this a very good guide for building expansive modular bases, and because they are all at a set height they are very easy to assemble.

I do agree that KAS could be incredibly useful and sensible having it in stock though, as it is very well balanced, looks very stock-alike and has soooo many useful bits (including making EVA more useful!)

Lets start simply again,

my suggestion is add a new part type [bases],

for begining something like Pod we have now,

-only with doors to enable IVA/EVA (IBA/EBA)for a start,

-(no reaction wheels etc)

- Module name parameter (as we have as craft name, and as it is on real ISS for example),

-small ammount of integrated electrical capacity),

-optionaly with ladder to go inside

-integration to science tech tree will expand gameplay more..

maybe a Cube shape size about Mk1-2 Command Pod , purpose will be obviously to deliver it to any surface anywhere and let it there for entry, occupy by krebals.

Later, it could expand with more parts to connect it with each other, provide rcs,electricity,small fuel resets.. and maybe as we have now - stationary[base] version of laboratory (Mobile Processing Lab MPL-LG-2).

Future vision could be lab for store/examining sufrace samples/transmit or send back sample material.

also Later, IVA (IBA) view.

all those principes we do have now, its basicaly only one or two pars more, huge diference for me to have those in stock.

Small task for developers, huge leap forward for players

Edited May 1, 2014 by Anthlon
